## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                | Type     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------- | -------- |
| `audio`    | `audio`    | The Link To The Audio File | `string` |
| `color`    | `color`    | The waveform color         | `string` |
| `duration` | `duration` |                            | `string` |
| `height`   | `height`   | The height of the waveform | `string` |
| `theme`    | `theme`    | The player theme           | `string` |
| `title`    | `title`    | The Track Title            | `string` |
